name: SuperVerse
description: SuperVerse is a unified Web3 ecosystem connecting gaming, DeFi, and AI under a single interoperable protocol. Its native token, $SUPER, powers transactions, governance, and access to immersive games, AI-powered tools, and liquidity infrastructure such as Blackhole DEX. Designed for real utility across multiple chains, $SUPER enables staking, protocol buybacks, and sustainable yield while supporting a growing suite of decentralized applications.
